data.message: Em !! I need a favor, please. The next time Suicidal Tendencies, Metallica, and YourSelf don't have anything going on at the same time, I'm gonna need you all to come up to Tacoma, Wash. (bud's legal. You can do early X-mas shoppin' for Snoop) so I may see you all at the same time, Kew Thanks. Let me know when your on your way, please.

replies.message: We will be when he does me this small favor.
And no, this isn't a Stan thing. I'm mostly OK.

https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=rO3Y4uJFXjM

Amazing Song.....!!!
If You Started The Song... You Can't Stop In Between....!!!

Watch It...
Listen It....
Feel It........
&
If You Liked... Then....
Don't Forget To Share It ..!!!
